member.name: T:ISerializer`1
member.summary: Implementations of this interface are able to serialize and deserialize an object graph from a given storage type.

member.name: M:ISerializer`1.Deserialize``1(`0)
member.summary: Deserializes an object graph from the provided storage.
member.typeparam: The type of object to be deserialized.
member.param: The storage from which the object will be reconstructed.

member.name: M:ISerializer`1.Serialize``1(`0,``0)
member.summary: Serializes the provided object graph and writes it to the storage.
member.typeparam: The type of object to be serialized
member.param: The storage where the object should be persisted.
The object graph to be serialized.
